title: ScpStatementExternalize
description:
ScpStatementExternalize is an XDR NestedStruct defines as:

```text struct { SCPBallot commit;         // c uint32 nH;                // h.n Hash commitQuorumSetHash; // D used before EXTERNALIZE } ```

ScpBallot.description:
ScpBallot is an XDR Struct defines as:

```text struct SCPBallot { uint32 counter; // n Value value;    // x }; ```

Value.description:
Value is an XDR Typedef defines as:

```text typedef opaque Value<>; ```
